recipesJson.name: Pinefapple
recipesJson.author: Synergy
recipesJson.description: A single, distraught Mango finds itself being forced into submission by a tribe of rapey pineapples; A solid White Gummy Bear base, paired with CAP Sweet Mango and french vanilla to round it out. TFA Jackfruit is used to complete the holes that CAP Sweet Mango creates. TFA Toasted Marshmallow assists with the mouthfeel and rounding out the overall profile.
